name: Inline: Out of Time
description:
"Inline: Out of Time" is an adrenaline-fueled 2D platformer packed with high-speed deliveries, urban parkour, and rail-grinding. Join the ranks of the Inline Initiative as the newest recruit of the logistics company Parcel Dynamics. Immerse yourself in a thrilling race against the clock as you roller-skate through a retro-futuristic cityscape. Master every twist and turn as you optimize your delivery route with one goal in mind: SPEED.



  • Experience fast-paced roller-skating action as you deliver packages through a variety of vibrant city environments.
  • Embrace the challenge of mastering your routes by practicing maneuvers such as wall-jumps and long-distance package throws. Remember, speed is your #1 priority, so "THIS SIDE UP" and "FRAGILE" are just light suggestions!
  • Enjoy our complimentary music player featuring a full soundtrack designed to enhance the relentlessly thrilling gameplay. Spanning genres including dance, techno, funk, and electronica, there is something for every speed demon.
  • After completing your deliveries, feel free to pet any cats you find in the city.



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
